text:
THE SOCIETY OF AUTHORS
84 DRAYTON GARDENS, LONDON, S.W.10
Telephone : Fremantle 6642-3
Cables : Auctoritas London
James A. Fellows, Esq.,
Assistant Director,
National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
1546 Connecticut Avenue,
Washington 36 D.C.,
U.S.A. 21st April 1964.
Dear Air. Fellows,
Thank you for your letter of April 14th.
We cannot grant permission free of charge hut in the
particular circumstances would be willing to grant permission
for payment of $5 for either poem.
I am enclosing a copy of a letter from Messrs. A.P. Watt
& Son confirming their permission in respect of publication
and shall be grateful if you will note the conditions they require.
Yours sincerely,
Anne Munro-Kerr.
Head of Radio and Television Department.
amk.jh.
